name: savate
short_description:
Savate e-commerce webshop is a module for WordPress that enables small business users to have a fully functional webshop integrated within WordPress. 

Savate works as a plugin and widgets within WordPress. It's user interface is powered by JQuery and Kendo UI OpenSource GPLv3. 

Savate aims to be a highly userfriendly powerfull and understandable webshop system, that will let you setup a webshop within just a fjew simple steps.

Because of its "download" and "drop in" nature you will find that its very easy to extend WordPress with this great module.
